うおおぅ…ここが冒険者の聖地、メサイアかあ。
すっご、ほんとに大都会だ…！
ability: 【A】[Place 1 Climax from Hand into Waiting Room] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 《冒険者》 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.
【S】[(1) Place this card into Waiting Room] Choose 1 「アイテム“騎士の剣”」 from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.

name: 可憐な男の子 グラミン
flavor_text: みなさん！気を付けてください！
ability: 【C】If you have 2 or more other 《冒険者》 Character, this card gets +2000 Power.

name: 若き狙撃手 グラミン
flavor_text: うう…頑張るんだ！
ability: 【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if you have other 《冒険者》 Character, during this turn, this card gets +2000 Power.
【A】When this card becomes REVERSE, if this card's battle opponent is Level 1 or lower, you may REVERSE that Character.

name: ユア＆キャロライン
flavor_text:
ユア「キャロル先生質問です！今言った蒼穹歴ってな～に？」
キャロライン「し…知らないの!?」
ability: 【C】During your turn, for each of your other 《冒険者》 Character, this card gets +500 Power.

【A】【CXCOMBO】When this card attacks, if 「冒険のはじまり」 is in your Climax Slot, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《冒険者》 Character or 「アイテム“騎士の剣”」, add it to Hand. (If not, return revealed card to its original position)

name: 双翼の祭司 サンドラ
flavor_text: 私はサンドラ。双翼教の祭司です。今後ともよろしくお願いします
ability: 【C】SUPPORT All your Character in front of this card gets +1000 Power.
【S】[(2) REST this card] Search your Deck for up to 1 《冒険者》 Character and show it to opponent, add it to Hand, shuffle your Deck afterwards.

name: メサイアの守護者 ジークフリート
flavor_text: 戦いなら僕にお任せ下さい！
ability: 【A】When this card attacks, during this turn, this card gets +X Power. X is equal to the number of your other 《冒険者》 Character x1000.
【A】ENCORE ［Place 1 《冒険者》 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］ (When this card is placed into Waiting Room from Stage, you may pay this Cost. If you do, place this card in its previous slot in REST)

name: はじまりの仲間たち キャロライン
flavor_text: わ、私はキャロライン…です。キャロルって、呼んで…ください
ability: 【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may place the top card of your Clock into Waiting Room.
【A】When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《冒険者》 Character, during this turn, it gets +X Power. X is equal to the number of your 《冒険者》 Character x500.

name: 冒険のはじまり
flavor_text: エレーナ「敵だ。私の後ろにさがっていてくれ」
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Gate：When this card is Triggered, you may choose 1 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand)

name: サンドラの友人 フェル

そうね
サンドラの言う通り

name: 新たなる冒険団 団長
flavor_text: 三人とも充分な資質を持っているということは俺の眼にかけて誓えます
ability: 【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《冒険者》 Character, add it to Hand, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room. (If not, return revealed card to its original position)
【S】CONCENTRATION ［(1) REST this card］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, you draw up to 1 card.

name: はじまりの仲間たち エレーナ
flavor_text: ん？なに？ああ、キャロルか。そこら辺に置いてきた。今頃困っているだろうな
ability: 【C】This card cannot Side Attack.
【A】When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《冒険者》 Character, during this turn, it gets +X Power. X is equal to the number of your other 《冒険者》 Character x500.

name: 真面目で実直 ヴィヴィアン

ability: 【C】If this card has face-up Marker, this card gets +2000 Power.

name: 冒険者協会会長 テレサ

name: フェルの友人 サンドラ

一番大事なことを
あなたはもう

ability: 【C】If this card has Blue Marker, this card gets +1000 Power.
【A】【CXCOMBO】When this card's battle opponent becomes REVERSE, if 「冒険のはじまり」 is in your Climax Slot, you draw up to 1 card, place up to 1 card from your top Deck into Stock.

name: 聖剣の騎士 ヴィヴィアン
flavor_text: 私はエンピレアンの騎士、ヴィヴィアン。これよりあなたの部下となります、団長様
ability: 【C】If this card has Blue Marker, this card gets +2000 Power.

name: アイテム“騎士の剣”

ability: Choose 1 of your Character with no Marker, place this card under that Character face-up as Marker, during this turn, it gets +1000 Power.

【A】RECOLLECTION At the beginning of your Main Phase, if this card is in Memory, return this card to Hand.
